actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the issuance of nontaxable bonds for the furnishing of electric energy not produced by petroleum or natural gas.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from taxation the interest on industrial development bonds issued for financing non-profit facilities for the production of electricity if such facilities do not use petroleum or natural gas for a fuel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the issuance of nontaxable bonds for the furnishing of electric energy not produced by petroleum or natural gas.
